Fragrance: Fragrance is the most intense form of memory. Keep yours sharp with the best fragrances from your favourite brands!
Men: There is something for men too! Care for your tough skin and styling for your beard & hair.

- Shop products after reading authentic reviews on the app so you can be confident in your purchase

Purplle is one of the highest top-rated online beauty, cosmetic & makeup shopping apps in India. With Sara Ali Khan as our brand ambassador, Purplle.com is India’s leading online beauty destination.

Skin Care Products:
Shop for natural skincare products on the Purplle skincare app from the top brands like Mamaearth, Good Vibes. Choose from serums, creams, moisturizers, sun protection & face washes. Shop the best skin care products from purplle shopping app.

Makeup Shopping App:
Buy the best makeup and Cosmetic products from the Purplle shopping app online from the best brands such as Lakme, Maybelline, NY Bae, Sugar. From lipsticks, kajal, eyeliners & blushes to foundations, concealers, primers & nail paints. Shop the best makeup products from the purplle shopping app.

Hair Care Products:
Shop for wide range of hair care products & tools on the Purplle Hair Care store! Shop the best hair care products from the purplle shopping app from the top brands such as Mamearth, Wow, Tresemme, Garnier.

Bath & Body Care Products:
Shop for bath and body products, including body washes, lotions and scrubs. Explore our range of personal care products, nail care products and intimate hygiene products from the top brands like Nivea, Good Vibes.

Fragrances :
Shop exquisite perfumes & deodorants from top brands like Engage, Body Cupid & Axe.

Men's Grooming:
Care for your tough skin and style for your beard & hair. Shop for shaving creams & beard trimmers to grooming kits and gift ideas for men from top brands Beardo, Gillette.

Mom & Baby:
For moms & moms-to-be, we have breast care, stretch mark creams, and everything your new baby needs. Shop from our top brands like The Mom’s Co.
